plot: Val gets to be both bodyguard and matchmaker for an East European prince while the other VIPs do the real protection. Everybody seem to have their own agendas.

Tasha expected King Solton of Ardenia to hire them out of gratitude for once helping to save his life, but it's Val's Hollywood fame which gets VIP hired. However Val's primary assignment is to act as royal matchmaker for Soltan's heir, prince Jordan. He's a good sport, who wants to modernize. Val keeps presenting him to commoners, even her waitress friend Maxine, but he picks slick Alex. VIP must ward off attacks from violent anti-monarchists, notably religious sect fanatics. Kay has romantic delusions about the prince. The court has its own hidden agenda, but there's are even worse secrets.—KGF Vissers
